returns._0: The IERC20 interface of the managed token
address Address of Fleet commander managing the ark if a Commander is assigned, address(0) otherwise

constructor.details: Validates input parameters and sets up the initial configuration.

params._params: The initial parameters for the Ark configuration.

returns._0: The maximum amount of tokens that can be deposited into the Ark
The address of the Fleet Commander Rewards Manager Factory contract

generateRole(uint8,address).details: This function is used to create unique role identifiers for contract-specific roles

params.roleTargetContract: The address of the contract the role is for

returns._0: The address of the HarborCommand contract
The maximum percentage of TVL that can be deposited into the Ark
maximum amount that can be moved to this Ark in one rebalance
maximum amount that can be moved from this Ark in one rebalance

name().details: Returns the name of the Ark.

returns._0: The name of the Ark as a string.
The address of the Raft contract

registerFleetCommander().details: This function is used to register the Fleet commander for the Ark it's called by the FleetCommander when ark is added to the fleet

returns._0: true if the Ark requires keeper data, false otherwise

params.newMaxDepositPercentageOfTVL: The new maximum deposit percentage of TVL

params.newMaxRebalanceInflow: The new maximum amount that can be moved to the Ark

params.newMaxRebalanceOutflow: The new maximum amount that can be moved from the Ark

returns._0: The address of the TipJar contract
The address of the Treasury contract

unregisterFleetCommander().details: This function is used to unregister the Fleet commander for the Ark it's called by the FleetCommander when ark is removed from the fleet all balance checks are done within the FleetCommander

asset().notice: Returns the ERC20 token managed by this Ark

commander().notice: Returns the address of the Fleet commander managing the ark

configurationManager().notice: Gets the address of the ConfigurationManager contract

depositCap().notice: Returns the deposit cap for this Ark

fleetCommanderRewardsManagerFactory().notice: Gets the address of the Fleet Commander Rewards Manager Factory contract

generateRole(uint8,address).notice: Generates a role identifier for a specific contract and role

harborCommand().notice: Gets the address of the HarborCommand contract

maxDepositPercentageOfTVL().notice: Returns the maximum percentage of TVL that can be deposited into the Ark

maxRebalanceInflow().notice: Returns the maximum amount that can be moved to this Ark in one rebalance

maxRebalanceOutflow().notice: Returns the maximum amount that can be moved from this Ark in one rebalance

raft().notice: Gets the address of the Raft contract

registerFleetCommander().notice: Registers the Fleet commander for the Ark

requiresKeeperData().notice: Returns whether the Ark requires keeper data to board/disembark

setDepositCap(uint256).notice: Sets a new maximum allocation for the Ark

setMaxDepositPercentageOfTVL(uint256).notice: Sets a new maximum deposit percentage of TVL for the Ark

setMaxRebalanceInflow(uint256).notice: Sets a new maximum amount that can be moved to the Ark in one rebalance

setMaxRebalanceOutflow(uint256).notice: Sets a new maximum amount that can be moved from the Ark in one rebalance

tipJar().notice: Gets the address of the TipJar contract

treasury().notice: Gets the address of the Treasury contract

unregisterFleetCommander().notice: Unregisters the Fleet commander for the Ark
